author: KC_Edge

changelog.release_notes:
A watchface dedicated to the Japanese rock duo B'z.

Ver. 1.0
=====
- 12 hour and 24 hour support, currently changeable in the smartwatch's Date & Time settings only. Configuration page to change this may be added in the future.

- Date is currently set at DD-MM-YYYY format. Configuration page to change this may be added in the future.

- Bluetooth icon will turn red when there is no connection between the app and the smartwatch.

description:
A watchface dedicated to the Japanese rock duo B'z.

Ver. 1.0
=====
- Support for 12 hour and 24 hour configurations, currently changeable in the smartwatch's Date & Time settings only. Configuration page to change this may be added in the future.
- Date is currently set at DD-MM-YYYY format. Configuration page to change this may be added in the future.
- Bluetooth icon will turn red when there is no connection between the app and the smartwatch.
